Page 307
MCC New York will provide an update to the Court as soon as the autopsy is completed and the official cause of death is determined. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to call me at (646)836- (b)(6); (b)(7)(C). Thank you for your time and attention to this matter.
Sincerely,
Lamine N'Diaye
Warden
MCC New York
cc: Michael Greco, U.S. Marshal, and John Csakany, Chief Deputy U.S. Marshal
Michael J. Fitzpatrick, Chief U.S. Probation Officer
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Assistant U.S. Attorneys
Counsel for Mr. Epstein
DOJ-OGR-00024843
